class_notes:
(Same as FILM 383 1)
(This seminar explores to what end music is used in political films. How does music affect our perception of political film? How does music manipulate our feelings for or against the subject matter? In this course we will survey some of the major films in this genre, focusing on hearing the film.)
course_description: This writing-intensive seminar explores to what end music is used in political films. How does music affect our perception of political films? How does music manipulate our feelings for or against the subject matter?
